metadata.title: CVE-2023-6915 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: A Null pointer dereference problem was found in ida_free in lib/idr.c inthe Linux Kernel. This issue may allow an attacker using this library tocause a denial of service problem due to a missing check at a functionreturn.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-7.7').
linux-aws package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
